title: Michael, Row the Boat Ashore
lyrics: Michael row the boat ashore, Hallelujah.  Michael row the boat ashore, Hallelujah.
Sister help to trim the sails, Hallelujah.  Sister help to trim the sails, Hallelujah.
River Jordan is chilly and cold, Hallelujah.  Chills the body but not the soul, Hallelujah.
River Jordan is deep and wide, Hallelujah.  Milk and honey on the other side, Hallelujah.
